replies.body: Is the skin legacy or exclusive?
Highly unlikely!
well i did get a riot kayle code when riot came to armageddon last year, it's a surprise :D

HAAHHAHAHAH

i went to the OCE hoytes event, we got academy {{champion:103}} . a skin me and my two friends already had.... everyone got academy {{champion:103}}
should give it to me if you cant use it
Can't, they expired pretty quickly. Pretty scrooge of them but oh well.

Niceeee.

Soon we will be able to combine the shirt from the OPL Final, the scarf and cap from IWCA, and 40 lanyards from all events to become true blue Aussie League fans. Or just reiterate that we're nerds I guess...
Just wondering I watched the games in the hoyts in sylvia park auckland on the sunday but did not receive a gift bag, will they be mailed to us?
Whats the suprise skin II? Anyone know?
no one will know until the day, hence it is called a 'surprise skin' {{item:3902}}
Correct! You get the Sunday bag (the one with the hat) as well as a flame chomper stress ball.

To clarify:

* Saturday's bag contains a cupcake stress ball
* Sunday's bag contains a Poro stress ball
* HOYTS' bag contains a Flame Chomper stress ball
so many UN-Grateful people in the world these days they probably complain about the colour of there stools  ;P
Are the surprise skin codes codes for a mystery gift or are they just a surprise for the day?
Each day has a different skin code. Hope this helps and they are not mystery gifts.
Cheers GeneralCoxy, you always seem to be on top of answering all of the questions that require answering with these community events. Good Job :)
No problem :) glad to help
What happens if you don't have the champion that the skin is for?
You would need to buy the champion.
incorrect i got a free champ and the skin out of it.

wait really, i thought skin codes gave the champ too. They used to at least
 {{item:3070}}

Any riot staff here, please help. I have bought the tickets for the Sunday event. Because of some personal reason my friends and I would likely to be late for around 1 or 2 hours for this event, which is stated to start at 12:00pm. Because the event stated that it would last till 10:30pm, If my friends and I were to be late, would they still allow us into the event and receive the same merchandises?
Is there any way these showbags will be available to buy online? , unfortunately we don't have an HOYTS cinema in my area :C
Yeah sorry you have to attend the event to get the bag.
What does it mean by the IWCA event program?
Program is a review of all the players and the teams.
A timetable of the events
Nah, you have to go to the actual event or to a Hoyts Viewing Party to get one
can we resale? so i buy them and sell them to others on line?
There's no rule stopping you. I personally have bought two tickets for each Viewing Party so I can sell the stuff to my friend (OPL and the 2015 World Championship viewing parties)

RITO, when I go to buy HOYTS tickets there is no option to{{summoner:14}} 
How do I buy them or are they already sold out like every league event ever {{item:3070}}
Hi the tickets are not sold out, please choose your cinema from the link provided.
Can you buy the show bags by themseleves? and if not do you have to be there for the whole event to get the show bags? {{champion:117}}
You can't buy them but you need a ticket for the event either at HOYTS or the main venue at the MCA.
Hey Riot, if we're not able to stay  for the whole event do we still get the showbag? (viewing at hoyts)
Yeah if you are there at the start you will get your bag :)
i cant seem to purchase tickets for the hoytes viewing party at tweed city are all the tickets sold out?
The Hoyts viewing parties are only at select Hoyts cinemas. You can see the cinemas listed here: http://www.hoyts.com.au/movies/2015/league_of_legends_2015_international_wild_card_all-stars.aspx
{{champion:161}} {{champion:103}}
come to perth man
ive been to a hoyts cinema to watch worlds last week and we got given academy ahri{{champion:103}}
Does the surprise skin codes include legacy skins?
This sound awesome what are the event dates/times?
IWC
What time will it be?
